TopicTitle: Capsule explodes randomly on ascent, says due to overheat.

Articles.Content:
Hi

This is my first post here so be nice

I have this problem that when i approach approx. 50 000m one of the capsules or probe bodies keeps exploding. The mission log then tells me that it exploded due to overheating, yet I get no warning or anything. I'm well above the thick atmosphere where this would be a problem.

The mods I have installed are all updated

KerbalEngineer

MechJeb2

NavBallDockingAlignmentIndicator

TriggerTech

The output log.

http://www.filedropper.com/outputlog

I hope I did everything right here Please help!
you are still in the atmosphere enough to create friction at that speed...slow down (reduce throttle) a bit and try again...
